summary.span: 实现基数据传输机制。

span.span: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，该接口的方法为数据传输提供与格式无关的机制。 implements the interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer. 通常与 拖放操作中的和一起使用。A is typically used with the and in drag-and-drop operations. 类提供接口的建议实现 。The class provides the recommended implementation of the interface. 建议使用 类，而不是 自行实现。It is suggested that you use the class rather than implementing yourself. 不同格式的多个数据片段可以存储在中 。Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a . 数据 按其关联格式从中检索。Data is retrieved from a by its associated format. 由于目标应用程序可能未知，因此，您可以通过将数据置于多个格式中，增加应用程序的相应格式的数据的可能性 。Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a in multiple formats. 有关预定义格式，请参阅。See for the predefined formats. 可以通过创建类的实例来实现自己的格式 。You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the class. 若要将数据存储在中 ，请将数据传递给构造函数或调用 。To store data in a , pass the data to the constructor or call . 可以将多种格式的数据添加到同一个中 。You can add data in multiple formats to the same . 如果你希望添加的数据仅以本机格式检索，请调用 并将 `autoConvert` 参数设置为 `false` 。If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 可以从与 兼容的任何格式检索数据 。Data can be retrieved from a in any format which is compatible with . 例如，可以将文本转换为 Unicode。For example, text can be converted to Unicode. 若要以存储数据的格式检索数据，请调用 并将 `autoConvert` 参数设置为 `false` 。To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 若要确定数据存储的格式，请调用 。To determine what formats the data is stored in, call . 若要确定格式是否可用，请 使用所需的格式调用。To determine if a format is available, call with the desired format. 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] ， 类提供附加方法，使您可以更轻松地处理常见格式的数据。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats. 若要向添加特定格式的数据 ，请使用适当的 `Set` *格式*方法，如 。To add data of a particular format to the , use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as . 若要从中检索特定格式的数据 ，请首先调用适当的 `Contains` *格式*方法 (如 ) 来确定是否 包含该格式的数据，然后调用适当的 `Get` *格式*方法 (例如 ) 以检索数据（如果 包含它）。To retrieve data of a particular format from the , first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) to determine whether the contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the contains it. > [!NOTE] > 使用带有剪贴板的图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于类的当前实现中存在限制，因此 使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别 .NET Framework 使用的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，必须与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口) (Api 进行互操作。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). > > 对象必须是可序列化的，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 有关序列化的详细信息，请参阅。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要非常具体的数据格式，则在序列化过程中添加到数据的标头可能会阻止应用程序识别数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留数据格式，请将数据作为 数组添加到， 并将传递 给 方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在中添加数据 。The following code example adds data in a . 首先，创建一个新的， 并在其中存储一个组件。First, a new is created and a component is stored in it. 然后，它会检查中是否存在适当类型的数据 。Then, it checks to see if data in the appropriate type exists in the . 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码需要 `textBox1` 已创建的。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例检索存储在中的数据 。The next example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先， 使用文本数据创建新的。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，检索数据，将其格式指定为字符串，并在文本框中显示。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 数据格式将自动从文本转换为字符串。The data format is automatically converted from text to string. 此代码需要 `textBox1` 已创建的。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法无法找到具有指定格式的数据，则会尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或者，如果数据是通过自动转换设置为存储的 `false` ，则此方法将返回 `null` 。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 若要确定数据是与格式关联还是可转换为格式，请 在调用前调用 。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用 以获取此中存储的数据的有效格式列表 。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果数据已存储，则可以将其转换为另一种格式，这种格式指定允许该转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，以 Unicode 形式存储的数据可以转换为文本。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当 `format` 为时 ，此方法将在以 .net 4.5 或更高版本为目标的应用程序中返回 utf-8 编码的字符串，并在面向 .net 4.0 或更低版本的应用程序中返回 ANSI 编码的字符串。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据 。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先， 使用文本数据创建新的。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，检索数据，将其格式指定为字符串，并在文本框中显示。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 此代码需要 `textBox1` 已创建的。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `autoConvert` 参数为 `true` ，并且此方法无法找到具有指定格式的数据，则它会尝试将数据转换为格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或者如果数据是在自动转换设置为的情况下存储的 `false` ，则此方法将返回 `null` 。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果 `autoConvert` 参数为 `false` ，则此方法返回指定格式的数据; `null` 如果找不到此格式的数据，则为。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要确定数据是与格式关联还是可转换为格式，请 在调用前调用 。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用 以获取此中存储的数据的有效格式列表 。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果数据已存储，则可以将其转换为另一种格式，这种格式指定允许该转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，以 Unicode 形式存储的数据可以转换为文本。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当 `format` 为时 ，此方法将在以 .net 4.5 或更高版本为目标的应用程序中返回 utf-8 编码的字符串，并在面向 .net 4.0 或更低版本的应用程序中返回 ANSI 编码的字符串。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用 `autoConvert` 参数指定是否转换数据格式，从而检索中存储的数据。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a , using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether to convert the data format. 首先， 使用文本数据创建新的。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，该示例尝试检索数据，并将其格式指定为字符串而不进行格式转换，也就是说， `autoConvert` 参数是 `false` 。Then the example tries to retrieve the data, specifying its format as a string and no format conversion, that is, the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`. 此操作失败，因为中没有字符串数据 。This operation fails because there is no string data in the . 接下来，该示例尝试再次检索数据，并将 `autoConvert` 参数设置为 `true` 。Next, the example tries to retrieve the data again, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 此操作成功，结果显示在中 。This operation succeeds and the results are displayed in a . 此代码需要 `textBox1` 已创建的。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
